structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Payment of permit fees to city or county assisting in regulation of installations.
law.text: A contract entered into pursuant to KRS 77.200 may provide that fees for permits shall be paid to the county or city, the officer, department, or agency of which county or city issues the permit, and may be retained by such county or city in whole or in part as the consideration, or part thereof, for issuing such permits. Otherwise, all fees paid for the issuance of permits shall be paid into the district treasury.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 52, effective March 14, 1952.
